name: Jump (itch) (Adil Dev)
description:
This game is inspired by dani game called "Balls?". The game is created within 20 minutes(or 30 to improve). All you have to do is jump and collect coins. Its quite fun to play game. MUST TRY!!!!

Controls/How to Play

A and D to move left and right, Space to jump.

You have to control the player by these keys. You have only 5 jumps but they are not limited. You can get more jumps by colliding with green platforms. Collect coins and make high scores.

Credits:

Music: Adil

Assets: Also Me

Sound Fx: ME ME ME!!!

System Requirements

No Requirements! Can even run on toaster or even your oven can run this!. :p

Android Version Coming Soon!
